**Government Tender Announcement**
===============

**Reference Number**: WS3647273618-Doc3709558815

**Tender Closing Date**: 2022-11-22T14:00:00 (latest by 14:00 hrs DST)

**Amendment Number**: 7

**Publication Date**: 2022-10-17

**Tender Type**: Request for Proposal (RFP) for Building Maintenance and Repair Services

**Description**: The Department of National Defence (DND) invites contractors to submit proposals for the demolition of an existing cafeteria space at the Carling Campus and the re-fit of a new laboratory setting for the Department's Technical Evaluation Centre (TEC).

**Objective**: The successful contractor will be awarded a contract to provide building maintenance and repair services.

**Key Details**

* **Location**: National Capital Region (NCR)
* **Award Criteria**: Lowest Price
* **Service Category**: *72101500 - Building maintenance and repair services
* **Trade Agreements**: *Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Contracting Entity**

* **Name**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Address**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5
* **Contact**: Gregoire (SPAC/PSPC) at gregoire.morin@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

**Notice URL**: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14369326

Note: Original note time (14:00 HAE) has been replaced with 14:00 hrs DST in the rewritten entry, as per Canadian DST rules.
